description: '''Brazilian gaucho music''' (in Portuguese ''música gaúcha brasileira'' or ''música nativista'') denotes the traditional music of [[Río Grande do Sul]], [[Santa Catarina (state)|Santa Catarina]] and [[Paraná (state)|Paraná]] states, whose population has a strong ancestry of European countries like Portugal, Spain, Italy and Germany. The word ''[[gaucho]]'' refers to the countryside and farm people.
